# Yeenus Token

Yeenus is a test ERC20 token with 8 decimals, created by BokkyPooBah for development and testing purposes.

## How to Get Test Tokens

Send a 0 value transaction from your account to the token contract address, and the contract will mint 1,000 YEENUS tokens for your account.

## Token Details

- **Decimals:** 8
- **Faucet Amount:** 1,000 tokens per request

## Related Tokens

- **WEENUS** - 18 decimals
- **XEENUS** - 18 decimals
- **ZEENUS** - 0 decimals

## Links

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/bokkypoobah/WeenusTokenFaucet)
